item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a Master of Engineering student at Cornell University. My interests lies deeply in the fields of Information/Control Theory, Machine Learning, and Finance Risk Assessment. My hometown is Shenyang, China. I lived in Fukuoka, Japan for almost 2 year when I was young. My family moved to Connecticut for a few years, and now I live in Ithaca, NY. I love meeting people from different cultural and geographic backgrounds. I am looking forward to more adventures in the future!

item.description: I ran 2 half-marathhons! I recently started rock climbing! I am a part-time food blogger My favorite book of 2021:

item.title: Projects
item.description: Current Project: MEng. Project: Federated Learning with Statistically Heterogenous Users Faculty Advisor: Qing Zhao PhD Advisor: Sudeep Salgia Project Goal: Investigate the optimak Federated Learning communication policy to save cost and maintain high performance. Project Status: ongoing, no website yet Light Following Robot: https://pages.github.coecis.cornell.edu/dh573/ECE3400-Danyu/ Project Status: complete LED Display and Memory Game https://pages.github.coecis.cornell.edu/ece3140-sp2021/dh573-mce54/ Project Status: complete
